Package com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.dialect

Class PostgresDialect

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.dialect.Dialect
org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL81Dialect
org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL82Dialect
com.peterphi.std.guice.hibernate.dialect.PostgresDialect
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.exception.spi.ConversionContext
public class PostgresDialect extends org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL82Dialect
A custom PostgreSQL Dialect for Hibernate that uses bytea instead of oid for byte[] Lobs
